author: Tom Carreras
title: Trump Media and Semler Scientific Could Be Cheapest Bitcoin Treasury Companies by This Metric
description: The commonly used mNAV is an insufficient gauge for measuring relative valuations, argues NYDIG's Greg Cipolaro
content:
